review_data.title: Hidden Gem
review_data.content: A great place to enjoy a drink with live music, where everyone is welcome to join in. You will not get a warmer welcome. Make sure you have cash as cards are not accepted. We will definitely be back.

review_data.title: Don't miss this authentic Swiss Experience
review_data.content: If you're looking to get off the tourist trail, make the effort to find the Alpli Bar in Zurich. It's conveniently located in Old Town featuring authentic Swiss music and company! Our time there was the highlight of our travels in Zurich.

review_data.title: My Favorite Bar in Zurich
review_data.content: If you want authentic, go to Älpli. There will be live music at night in the small bar area from varied artist, mostly “older” and all authentic. It doesn’t matter if you’re the only one in there or there’s a lively crowd, the music is...More

review_data.title: Fun Local Bar
review_data.content: We stayed up on the top floor in this building. What a great local bar. They have live performers all the time. Great old time bar. Small but lively. Beer is cold and inexpensive. Great service. They speak some English too!!

review_data.title: Awesome place
review_data.content: A hidden gem. Great music, good value, excellent ambience. The live music is a great experience and anyone is free to join in if they desire. Maria is a legend. Can’t wait to go back.

review_data.title: Musica e Bar
review_data.content: Un bar pieno di musica, i proprietari sono veramente adorabili. Con la loro simpatia e musica gestiscono questo locale storico...More

review_data.title: Best time in Zurich
review_data.content: Not so easy to find and when you do find it, it's a bit of a surprise. Up the stairs to a very quaint but somewhat empty bar. So we ordered a couple of drinks and at around 9 p.m. the music started. Finally, some...More

review_data.title: Suahpah! Oder: Great plaaaace!
review_data.content: We stopped by coincidence as it was freezing outside and it was the nearest place to warm up. We were stunned by the original furniture and Swiss decoration and not to forget the music. If you like genuine swiss atmosphere - then u have to...More

review_data.title: Charming cosy Alpine bar
review_data.content: Friendly bar with folk group playing traditional music. Staff were welcoming and talkative. Simple bar snacks available. We stayed a while for the folk music from a 4-piece group playing accordions and double bass with occasional yodelling.. Musicians offered us snuff (tobacco) which we politely...More

review_data.title: Typisch Schweiz
review_data.content: Wer Vorurteile pflegt, sollte hier hin ;-) Uriges Ambiente a la Kuh- und Hühnerstall. Schweizerische Live-Musik und jeder kann und...More

review_data.title: Excellent Local Alps Style Bar in Zurich Old Town
review_data.content: Very authentic feeling Alps style bar with live Swiss-German music. The proprietor gets everyone involved in the music by playing a long and passing out simple musical instruments to the patrons to do the same. They serve a specialized drink, the Alpli-Milch which seems like...More

review_data.title: This place is awesome!
review_data.content: Went here with my wife as part of a food tour. This is a charming place that gives as close a feel to a Swiss mountain chalet as you can get in Zurich. There was a 3 piece band playing songs while the locals joined...More

review_data.title: The reason I review Katie hustlers bar again is Perseverance
review_data.content: Nothing, except the Swiss and German countries folklore and Yodeling Bands have changed. Kati manages to keep her pricing stable over several years, still very affordable.The fun of course is guaranteed especially if the regular guests are present, some of them ready to tune in...More

review_data.title: A diamond - alpine style
review_data.content: What a gem. You feel like very, very remote in a small village or high on a mountain. Very casual, country music and really warm, friendly service. Live music every evening and special schnaps recipes. Love it. Defined not posh or hipster Zurich style !

review_data.title: Singalong with Sepp , Service by Anastasia
review_data.content: An evening perfect almost with family singing happily along. The usual Punters , lovers of Swiss folklore and Yodeling along were missing they must have stayed home curing the aftereffects from New Years Eve, so we had the genial Sepp and his instruments almost to...More

review_data.title: Empfehlenswert
review_data.content: Mir hend en sehr lustige abed kha. Hend sehr gnosse. Isch unterhaltsam sehr herzig und herzlich, älplermilch isch au sehr...More

review_data.title: Urchig, sympathisch aber keine Kreditkarten!
review_data.content: Wenn man für ein Stück Greyerz-Käse 12.50 bezahlt und für eine Karaffe schaumige (köstliche) Aelplimilch fast 20.-- dann sollte man...More

review_data.title: Alphütten in der Altstadt
review_data.content: Die Älpli Bar ist seit Jahren eine Institution im Niederdorf. 365 Tage offen, am 1. Dienstag im Monat wird gesungen....More

review_data.title: Plongée alpestre en milieu urbain
review_data.content: Un petit bar aux allures de chalet, ratelier en guise de bar. Tout ici vibre au rythme des alpages et...More

review_data.title: Try the Aelplimilch
review_data.content: The Aelpli bar is a small place, located on a narrow street in the Limmat. The atmosphere is quite homey, and there is usually live folk music on a nightly basis. though the night we were there it was a Slovakian soloist. The beverage to...More

review_data.title: Divertido para ir em grupo
review_data.content: Éramos umas vinte pessoas, foi divertido porque ocupamos inteiramente uma área reservada do bar. Atendimento eficientemente descontraído. Música ao vivo...More

review_data.title: Great after dinner drink spot
review_data.content: Just a great live music bar in Old Town for after dinner drinks. Live music every night in the barn.

review_data.title: Genial Schwiizerisch
review_data.content: Versteckt im Niederdorf präsentiert sich die Älpli Bar als einen Ort, welcher die Schweizer Kultur allen näher bringt. Ein toller...More

review_data.title: Kleine Perle im Dörfli
review_data.content: Sucht man etwas ausserhalb des Mainstreams, wird man hier fündig. Die einmalige Stimmung versetzt einen innert Minuten in die Berge....More

review_data.title: Gemütlichkeit
review_data.content: Zufällig hörten wir von dieser ausserordentlicher bar ,durch einen Musiker der Kappele Knüssel !und wir wurden sehr überrascht 😳 von...More

review_data.title: Swiss farm feel
review_data.content: Very cool little bar. The house special Milch is a must try. Live music every night and, if you can play an instrument, you will be invited to join in. I heard a tale of a famous band stumbling in & playing a set. A...More

review_data.title: Authentic Swiss Alps Barn Feel.
review_data.content: The ALPLI BAR is a hidden gem! Love this cozy, friendly, warm bar. The interior is like an old Swiss Alps barn – if you’re sitting at the bar, you can see that is actually a stall where the cows stuck their head through to...More

review_data.title: Neutral bin ich hier nicht, da eine von mir betreute Sängerin hier singt
review_data.content: Ich war schon einige Male trotz meinem vormaligen Abscheu gegen Schweizer Volksmusik hier, meine Sängerin eine super junge Chansonniere wurde...More

review_data.title: very very swiss, with live swiss music
review_data.content: If you visit Zürich this place is a must, you will be surprised once you step into this place, nothing in Zurich get's even close to this one

review_data.title: Grat place
review_data.content: Great place with a lovely atmosphere. It feels like you are in the alps. The in-house specialty is a must try. It does actually taste quite good.

review_data.title: Einfach und Grossartig
review_data.content: In der Aelplibar herrscht Einklang zwischen Wirtin, Personal, Gaesten und Musiker des Abends. Mein Gast Inga Ines eine weltreisende junge...More

review_data.title: Unexpected experience! Not to miss if you are a tourist in town
review_data.content: This is a small hidden bar in an alley close to Niederdorfstrasse. A friend of mine brought me here once and since then everytime I have visitors in Switzerland we always make a stop here. It's actually a traditional swiss bar, with traditional decoration and...More

review_data.title: Authentic old Swiss pub. 3 piece accordion band. Very nice!
review_data.content: 3 piece accordion band. Singing customers. Beer. Laughter. Delightful and authentic old Swiss pub! Completes my night here in Zurich. Should visit to experience a great Swiss culture.

review_data.title: Unexpectedly Wonderful!
review_data.content: Loved this bar. Amazingly in the heart of Zurich a super traditional bar with great live traditional music. Totally made my visit special. Will be back!

review_data.title: One of the best
review_data.content: We were brought here by friends of ours (Swiss Natives) who live south of Zurich. We stopped in for a nightcap after having dinner elsewhere and boy am I glad that we did. By the time we left we had one of the most memorable...More

review_data.title: Hidden Gem!
review_data.content: My friends and I were finishing up our backpacking trip with a couple days in Zurich and were just walking around when we heard the music coming from this bar. We took a chance and popped in and SO glad we did! It is a...More

review_data.title: Tipico svizzero
review_data.content: Locale caratteristico tutto in legno. Adatto per un aperitivo o dopo cena con tanto di musica folkloristica. Prezzi al di...More

review_data.title: Immer wieder eine Freude in der traditionellle Aelpli Bar
review_data.content: Gute Musik,, Guter Service, gute Leute. Was will mann noch mehr und dazu auch noch gute Preise. Eine der wenigen...More

review_data.title: Katie Halter hält einen Ort der Schweizer Volksmusik am Leben
review_data.content: Etwas versteckt in einer Seitengasse befindet sich die Aelpli Bar im ersten Stockwerk. Das Interieur ist rustikal, aber keineswegs kitschig....More

review_data.title: A friendly lady working the bar
review_data.content: Alpli Bar is located down a small alley in Niederdorf. This pubs decoration places one right in the heart of everything Swiss from music videos (taped from YouTube) to paintings of Swiss mountains on the wall and other decorations such as old lanterns, cow skulls...More

review_data.title: Traditional experience
review_data.content: Chanced upon this place when my friend pointed the sign on a narrow lane. Was thrilled to see a cow barn converted into a pub. Charming people, live music and a very honest and welcoming lady behind the bar. Do not miss it if you...More

review_data.title: You wouldn't expect this in Zürich
review_data.content: Very nice little Hillbilly place. Nice and honest people with a good heart. They celebrate themselves and traditional music. If it's only for a drink. If you're in Zurich you have to go there! You'll enter a world you wouldn't expect in Zurich.

review_data.title: Very nice authentic Swiss bar
review_data.content: This is a lovely bar in the centre of Zurich. A hidden gem full of locals with traditional Swiss folk music and song. Definitely a place to go if you are looking for something different with a local atmosphere. Highly recommended.

review_data.title: folklore e tradizione
review_data.content: Un posto davvero carino, in un ambiente diverso nell cuore del casco antico Di zurigo. Sono stata qui ben 2...More

review_data.title: Incroyable!
review_data.content: Oh mais quelle découverte!!!! Cet endroit est incroyable. On se croirait dans un chalet en pleine montagne suisse. C est...More

review_data.title: The place to be in zurich.
review_data.content: Nice people, live music and a nice aelpli-milch. Be sure to try the älpli-milch, a creamy, strong and tasty drink that you share with a friend. Despite the poor website a nice place to visit.

review_data.title: Great insider tipp for Zurich! If you are visiting, go there!
review_data.content: The Älpli-Bar is a great insider tipp for anyone visiting Zurich. If you do not have the time to go up in the mountains and experience traditional Swiss Jodler music and the atmosphere of a Swiss chalet, then this is your spot! It's a bit...More

review_data.title: La vera Svizzera
review_data.content: Se volete assaporare la vera cucina svizzera in un ambiente tipico di baita ma in città, allora dovete provare l'Alpli...More

review_data.title: one of my favorite spots in Zurich
review_data.content: Should you visit Zurich and are not able to make it to the Alps, visit the älpli bar, once you step into the bar, you will immediately forget that you are in the biggest town of Switzerland. You will feel like being right in the...More

review_data.title: Abstecher ins Zürcher Niederdörfli / ÄLPLIBAR
review_data.content: Sehr nett. Traditionel schweizerisch. Am Wochenende auch mit Livemusik. Die Älpler-Milch (Alkaholisch) ein muss!!! Nette Bedienung, Nicht jedermanns/fraus sache ;-)...More

review_data.title: Traditional Swiss Music
review_data.content: Alpli Bar has traditional Swiss music every evening starting at 8pm -- a different group every night of the week. It's a small bar and seems to attract mostly a local crowd. It's conveniently located in the old section of Zurich not far from the...More

review_data.title: Älpli Bar Zürich – Where are you Tante Klara ?
review_data.content: The Älpli Bar located at the Ankengasse 5 in Zurich used to be a place to go if you wanted to hear authentic Swiss Folk Music. It became famous during the 60ties, when “Tante Klara” invented the “Älpli Milch”, a mixture of Eggs, Kirsch (Cherry...More
